title: Shriners Hospitals for Children Open 2014, PGA Tour
headline: 2014 Shriners Hospitals for Children Open
description: While Ben Martin was securing his first PGA Tour victory, several golf fans in attendance were enjoying a greenside pool party. Here are the best photos from the 2014 Shriners Hospitals for Children Open in Las Vegas.
page_title: Shriners Hospitals for Children Open 2014, PGA Tour
body: While Ben Martin was securing his first PGA Tour victory, several golf fans in attendance were enjoying a greenside pool party. Here are the best photos from the 2014 Shriners Hospitals for Children Open in Las Vegas.
